info.title: Infoblox SMARTFOLDER API
info.description: OpenAPI specification for Infoblox NIOS WAPI SMARTFOLDER objects

get.description: Returns a list of smartfolder:children objects matching the search criteria
Returns a specific smartfolder:children object by reference
Returns a list of smartfolder:global objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The global Smart Folder descriptive comment.

get.description: Returns a specific smartfolder:global object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific smartfolder:global object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific smartfolder:global object by reference

get.description: Returns a list of smartfolder:personal objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The personal Smart Folder descriptive comment.

parameters.name: is_shortcut
parameters.description: Determines whether the personal Smart Folder is a shortcut.

get.description: Returns a specific smartfolder:personal object by reference

put.description: Updates a specific smartfolder:personal object by reference

delete.description: Deletes a specific smartfolder:personal object by reference

ReturnFields.name: _return_fields
ReturnFields.description: Enter the field names followed by comma

ReturnFieldsPlus.name: _return_fields+
ReturnFieldsPlus.description: Enter the field names followed by comma, this returns the required fields along with the default fields

MaxResults.name: _max_results
MaxResults.description: Enter the number of results to be fetched

ReturnAsObject.name: _return_as_object
ReturnAsObject.description: Select 1 if result is required as an object

PageId.name: _page_id
PageId.description: Page id for retrieving next page of results

Schema.name: _schema
Schema.description: Return schema for this object type

Inheritance.name: _inheritance
Inheritance.description: If this option is set to True, fields which support inheritance, will display data properly.

value.description: The value of the extensible attribute.

ExtAttrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object.

resource.description: The object retuned by the Smart Folder query.

value_type.description: The type of the returned value.

value_integer.description: The integer value of the Smart Folder query.

value_string.description: The string value of the Smart Folder query.

value_date.description: The timestamp value of the Smart Folder query.

value_boolean.description: The boolean value of the Smart Folder query.
